ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(SBQQ__Product__r.Product_Group__c)<> "Subscription Credit", TEXT(SBQQ__Product__r.Product_Type__c)<> "Services Discount", OSA_List_Price__c<Original_List_Unit_Price__c, $User.Id <> "00550000001QCqH", /*Jason Wood*/ $User.Id <> "00550000002q64G", /*Jennifer Richard*/ $User.Id <> "00550000007gzIW", /*Rita Rodriguez*/ $User.Id <> "00550000001OWve", /* Vera Friss*/ $User.Id <> "0052J000008ghJC", /*Lea Smith*/ $User.Id <> "0052J000008gpbV", /*Kate Hann*/ $User.Id <> "0052J000008geae", /*Greg Gardener*/ $User.Id <>"00550000004PGDf", /* Maiya Hilliard */ $User.Id <>"00550000005KJzD", /* Chris Turk */ $User.Id <>"0052J000008gQZI", /*Sun Nathan*/ $User.Id <>"00550000002q64u", /* Jennifer Heltsley */ $Profile.Id <> "00e30000000bvR3" /*System Admin*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: OSA List Price cannot be less than List Unit Price.
